description: User views list of their chats
steps: Verify list of chats is displayed
Verify each chat shows title, timestamp, and message count
Verify chats are sorted by most recent
Enter search query in search input
Verify URL updates with search parameter
Verify filtered results match search query
Verify all chats are displayed again

description: Empty chat list shows start prompt
steps: Sign in with account that has no chats
Verify Start a Chat button is displayed

description: Search with no results shows empty state
steps: Navigate to /chats page with existing chats
Enter search query that matches no chats
Verify no chats found message appears
Verify suggestion to try different search term
